mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (title, contents, category_id, reg_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{contents}, #{categoryId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.contents, DATE_FORMAT(p.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDate, p.category_id AS categoryId FROM post p INNER JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE c.blog_id = #{blogId} ORDER BY p.reg_date DESC
SELECT id, title, contents, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDate, category_id AS categoryId FROM post WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY reg_date DESC
SELECT id, title, contents, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDate, category_id AS categoryId FROM post WHERE id = #{postId}
